answers.answer: Some medications can cause mild elevations in bodily temperature.  I'm not sure if yours are one of them, but it would be worth looking into.  Do you feel ill like any nausea or sweats when this happens?  Have you ever had prostatitis before, and did they give you any antiobiotics when your prostate gland was checked for enlargement?
